Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: DEBU 724 0m Error handling CouchDB request. Error:not_found, Status Code:404, Reason:Database does not exist. 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7167973Z --- FAIL: TestDBRequestTimeout (1.12s) 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168046Z couchdb_test.go:634: 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168132Z Error Trace: couchdb_test.go:634 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168183Z Error: An error is expected but got nil. 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168232Z Test: TestDBRequestTimeout 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168310Z Messages: Error should have been thown while trying to create a couchdb instance with a connection timeout 2019-12-05T09:22:11.7168657Z  36m2019-12-05 09:21:55.745 UTC couchdb VerifyCouchConfig -> DEBU 725 0m Entering VerifyCouchConfig() {code} >

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: The failure wasn't searchable so a new issue was opened. Hence, the older issue is a duplicate of the newer issue.
